title: Work profile sounds - Work phone ringtone do not work
content:
Hi. 
Android 10 setting “Work profile sounds - Work phone ringtone” do not work. 
Instead of the selected melody for the work profile, I hear a single sound during an incoming call from a work contact. It was the same on my previous Pixel XL. 

Thank you for your help!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
